name: Elliptical Bob and Conical Chel
description:
Elliptical Bob and Conical Chel

A dimension swapping platformer made for Asymmetrical Jam. Guide Elliptical Bob and Conical Chel as they attempt to find and destroy the interdimensional reactor binding their dimensions together. Is this story actually reflected in the game? Only loosely!

Linux and mac builds are untested. Web build should work fine except sometimes the audio seems to lag a lot. Try a download build if you have issues!

Challenges attempted:

  1. Hide a lobster
  2. Support color-blind players
